name: Wooing Wiseau 2: College Edition ll A Tommy Wiseau Dating Sim
name_original: Wooing Wiseau 2: College Edition ll A Tommy Wiseau Dating Sim
description:
A sequel to Wooing Wiseau! It happened!

I made this in less than 48 hours, funnily enough at the same time of the Global Game Jam. It's a silly game that isn't made to be taken too seriously. 

I mean no harm to any of the celebrities featured in this game.
